mapper.insert: insert into favor ( favor_no, user_no, ccba_ctcd_nm1, ccba_ctcd_nm2, ccba_ctcd_nm3 ) value ( 0, #{user_no}, #{ccba_ctcd_nm1}, #{ccba_ctcd_nm2}, #{ccba_ctcd_nm3} )
mapper.update: update favor set ccba_ctcd_nm1 = #{ccba_ctcd_nm1}, ccba_ctcd_nm2 = #{ccba_ctcd_nm2}, ccba_ctcd_nm3 = #{ccba_ctcd_nm3} where user_no = #{user_no}
update favor set bcode_name1 = #{bcode_name1}, bcode_name2 = #{bcode_name2}, bcode_name3 = #{bcode_name3} where user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: select * from heritage h, favor f where f.user_no = #{user_no} and (h.ccba_ctcd_nm = f.ccba_ctcd_nm1 or h.ccba_ctcd_nm = f.ccba_ctcd_nm2 or h.ccba_ctcd_nm = f.ccba_ctcd_nm3) and (h.ccce_name like concat('%',f.ccce_name1,'%') or h.ccce_name like concat('%',f.ccce_name2,'%') or h.ccce_name like concat('%',f.ccce_name3,'%')) and (h.bcode_name like concat('%',f.bcode_name1,'%') or h.bcode_name like concat('%',f.bcode_name2,'%') or h.bcode_name like concat('%',f.bcode_name3,'%')) order by rand() limit 20;
